meta.subject: English Language
meta.instructions: Answer all questions. Choose the option that best completes each sentence or answers the question.

questions.question:
Choose the option that best completes the sentence:
He was punished because he ______ the school rules.

Choose the word that is nearest in meaning to the underlined word:
The boy was brave in the face of danger.

Choose the option that has the same vowel sound as the underlined letters:
fate

Choose the option that best completes the sentence:
Neither the teacher nor the students ______ present.

Choose the option that best interprets the proverb:
"A stitch in time saves nine."

Choose the word that best completes the sentence:
He promised to _____ the job by tomorrow.

Choose the word nearest in meaning to the underlined word:
The lecture was *tedious*.
The opposite of "scarce" is:

Choose the option that best completes the proverb:
A stitch in time saves _____.
Which sentence is grammatically correct?
Choose the word that is opposite in meaning to “generous”.

Identify the part of speech of the underlined word in the sentence:
She was *happily* married.

Choose the correct question tag:
You are coming, _____?

Fill the blank with the correct preposition:
He apologized _____ his mistake.

Which word has a different vowel sound?
A. coat  B. goat  C. though  D. cough
Choose the word closest in meaning to “resilient”.

Choose the correct passive form:
They built the house in 1990.
Choose the correct spelling.

Choose the best word to complete the sentence:

Choose the option that completes the sentence:

Which of the following sentences is correct?

Choose the option that best completes the sentence:
Everyone _____ invited to the party.

Select the correct conjunction:

Choose the correct comparative form: 
She is _____ than her sister.
Which of the following is a correct sentence?

options.text: He go to school every day.
He goes to school every day.
He going to school every day.
He gone to school every day.
